title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, April 21
description: A final wrap of the New York primary results and a look at next week's big primary contests in a handful of northeast states including Maryland and Pennsylvania. This episode, host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith, campaign reporters Sam Sanders and Sarah McCammon, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. Find the team on Twitter @tamarakeithNPR, @samsanders, @sarahmccammon, and @DomenicoNPR. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org. More coverage at nprpolitics.org.
